featured.name: Type the Food
featured.description: One-player browser game where the player remembers food names from the menu and types them out when a customer orders correctly.

featured.name: Timetable Planner
featured.description: Web application for helping students plan out their school timetables by displaying potential course and section combinations.

featured.name: Ice Cream Game
featured.description: Original Monopoly-like board game where two players move around the board to buy ice cream flavours and collecting stars through them.

other.name: inGRADEient
other.description: Mobile app used to obtain information about product ingredients and their potential risks by taking a photo of the product label.

other.name: Mini Drum Kit
other.description: Handy drum kit with a basic Kick, Snare, Hi-Hat, and Crash that can be played easily through key strokes in the web browser.

other.name: Flying Vegetable
other.description: A game where a user moves a vegetable up and down to avoid hitting obstacles. First made with Java, then again with JavaScript.
